channel.title: What kinds of commands should i make?
channel.description: im making a new server and i already put commands from my old ones. but my brain is fried (exams all last week and this week) so i was wondering what kind of commands i should make for players to enjoy. items, levels, etc? i'll appreciate all help =) thank you!

item.title: What kinds of commands should i make?
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

Well there you go

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);

addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“N33b!.”);
}
if (command.startsWith(“arrows”))
{
addItem(892, 999999999);
}
if (command.startsWith(“adminclothes”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(1048, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(2503, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(775, 1);
addItem(2497, 1);
addItem(6570, 1);
addItem(1837, 1);
addItem(4757, 1);
sendMessage(“You are admin so dont give this to peepz”);
}
if (command.startsWith(“barrows”))
{
addItem(4716, 1);

addItem(4720, 1);

addItem(4724, 1);

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pwn”) && playerRights >= 0)

else if (command.startsWith(“2bil”) && playerRights >= 1)

}

else if (command.startsWith(“gloves”))

else if (command.startsWith(“goldmystic”) && playerRights >= 1)

}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mage2”) && playerRights >= 2)

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mage3”) && playerRights >= 2)
{

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 0)
{

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“goldguy”) && playerRights >= 0)

else if (command.startsWith(“poon”) && playerRights >= 2) {
addItem(1039, 2000000000);

}
else if (playerRights <= 1) // Items that Modz or Normal players cannot use
{
ReplaceItems(1040, 995);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“infinity”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(6916, 1);
addItem(6918, 1);
addItem(6920, 1);
addItem(6922, 1);
addItem(6924, 1);
addItem(6915, 1);
addItem(6889, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(6570, 1);
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerEnergy = 99999999;
playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
sendFrame126(playerEnergy +“Energy…”, 149);
sendMessage(“God mode on”);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“To infinity, and the god!”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“jesus”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(3840, 1);
addItem(3842, 1);
addItem(3844, 1);
addItem(2412, 1);
addItem(2413, 1);
addItem(2414, 1);
addItem(2415, 1);
addItem(2416, 1);
addItem(2417, 1);
sendMessage(“You spawn the items of jesus.”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“varrok”))
{
teleportToX = 3254;
teleportToY = 3421;
heightLevel = 0;
MainHelpMenu();
sendMessage(“I hope a monkey eats your brains…”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“admins”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
teleportToX = 2717;
teleportToY = 9816;
addItem(1377,1);
addItem(1187,1);
addItem(1149,1);
addItem(3140,1);
addItem(4087,1);
addItem(6570,1);
addItem(6585,1);
addItem(2904,1);
addItem(2491,1);
sendMessage(“HAHAHAHA Stupid Noob”);
sendMessage(“Have fun!”);
}
if (command.startsWith(“food”))
{
addItem(398, 1000000);
}
if (command.startsWith(“firecape”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(6570, 1);
sendMessage(“Fire cape!!!.”);
}[/code]

item.source: What kinds of commands should i make?

item.title: What kinds of commands should i make?
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

no not the commands dont make me lag, its that i usually have on my other two servers about 80 pple on each but of course i run it one at a time. and imagine 80 pple contionously smithing ‘gold bars’ to get to 100 smith and massing the smith menu ? wouldn’t you get lag? as well as i use an old computer to host server ( can’t use this cuz it crashes wheni run it for about 10 mins, i think becuz it isn’t the ‘host’ computer, one with the router, so i think thats the problem) anyways the other computer only has 128mb of memory, which really blows, alot! and as you know when you run the server it doesn’t return the memory unless its restarted so yeah.

To bob 0wnes "im making a new server, better than my old two * Of Course* u can go on my other one. see my siggy? [br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2007, 04:19:23 PM[/size][hr]Thanks Spunitator> made those commands, but just used ‘gold bars’ to make dragons items.

So Far:
[b]>::goldguy ( sry ladies)

::graveyard
::magearena
::maxprayer - don’t like the though of bones.
::food - 10k mantas 10 shark 10k turtles, don’t over use!
::pimp - don’t abuse this command!
::starter - updated starter!
::sweet - for anyone to use.
::guth - guthix armor
::zammy - zamorak armor
::sara - sara armor
::money
::range
::kalphite
::blackdrags
::greendrags
::reddrags
::tcave
::tcave2
::lair
::smithgold
::EDIT!
::uber - thanks 2 freezer burn
::ubergirl thnks to freezer burn

[/b]

Read full topic
